response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you and represents a significant investment that could greatly benefit your endeavors. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $900,000. I believe this offer presents an attractive proposition, considering the high value you place on it. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you need more information to make a decision.", "product_price": 900000}
